doc.after: Bennett argues that there are two challenges confronting his concept of the Anglosphere The first is finding ways to cope with rapid technological advancement and the second is the geopolitical challenges created by what he assumes will be an increasing gap between anglophone prosperity and economic struggles elsewhere 7
